full_summary:
# Request for Supply Arrangement
### Forklift Truck E60HS 21FRKL A
#### Reference and Solicitation
* `WS4158988049`: Reference Number
* `WS4158988049`: Solicitation Number
* `Doc4159001707`: Version documentation

#### Tender Details
* **Version**: 1 (amended)
* **Publication Date**: August 22, 2023
* **Closing Date**: March 18, 2026, at 14:00 EST
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangement

#### Goods and Services
* UNSPSC Code: `24101604`
* UNSPSC Description: *Lifts*
* Trade Agreement(s): Canada has the following bilateral and multilateral trade agreements:
	+ NAFTA
	+ CFTA
	+ WTO GPA

#### Requirements and Definitions
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking to establish a Supply Arrangement for the procurement of suitable Forklift Truck (E60HS 21FRKL A) configurations. Suppliers are invited to submit an arrangement for one or more configurations, as described in the Purchase Description.

#### How to Bid
Visit our *Ariba Discovery* portal to submit your bid. You must submit all the required supporting documentation and the bid by March 18th, 2026, by 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be deemed unresponsive.

#### Contact Information
* Daniel Martial
* daniel.martial@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

#### Notice URL
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17235924?extsite=MTcyMzU5MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that all requested documents need to be submitted in the required formats. Refer to the Ariba Discovery portal for detailed instructions on how to submit your bid.
